sentences.en: a hole in the ground
sentences.cn: 地上的一个洞

sentences.en: a room furnished in the modern style
sentences.cn: 一间以现代风格装饰的房间

sentences.en: a short note scribbled in pencil
sentences.cn: 用铅笔草草写下的一小段笔记

sentences.en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.cn: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.en: he was in and out of jail for most of his twenties.
sentences.cn: 他二十几岁时几乎一直频繁进出监狱。

sentences.en: Her parents always talk to her in German.
sentences.cn: 她的父母总是用德语和她交谈。

sentences.en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
sentences.cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

sentences.en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentences.cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.cn: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.en: I never went in pubs.
sentences.cn: 我从不进酒吧。

sentences.en: I was laid up in bed with acute rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 我染上了急性风湿，卧病在床。

sentences.en: In so far as you are a student, you are free to use the library.
sentences.cn: 只要你是学生,便可免费使用该图书馆。

sentences.en: it looks as if we're in for a storm.
sentences.cn: 我们看起来似乎要遭受一场暴风雨。

sentences.en: Kaspar had spoken know-ledgeably about the state of agriculture in Europe.
sentences.cn: 卡斯帕对欧洲农业状况发表了一番颇有见地的见解。

sentences.en: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.cn: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.en: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.cn: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.en: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.en: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.cn: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
sentences.cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

sentences.en: She shouted my name in a harsh voice.
sentences.cn: 她用刺耳的声音叫我的名字。

sentences.en: She was afraid in a way that was quite new to her.
sentences.cn: 她感到从未有过的害怕。

sentences.en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentences.cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentences.en: The council recently drew fire for its intervention in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 委员会最近因为介入该起争端而遭到批评。

sentences.en: the Krays were in with a couple of well-known MPs.
sentences.cn: 克赖一家与几个著名的国会议员有很好的交情。

sentences.en: The papers in maths and English are very testing.
sentences.cn: 数学试卷和英语试卷很难。

sentences.en: The title was printed in capital letters.
sentences.cn: 标题是用大写字母印刷的。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentences.cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

sentences.en: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
sentences.cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

sentences.en: We waited in silence.
sentences.cn: 我们静静地等候着。

sentences.en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentences.cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

sentences.en: You're in for a big surprise.
sentences.cn: 你肯定会大吃一惊

words.tran_cn: 心底的，内心深处的；最深的
内心的；最里面的，最深处的；秘密的
向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的

phrases.tran_cn: 必定会遭到，免不了遭受（尤指坏事）
作为感谢、致敬或表示尊重
频繁出入（房子）；频繁进出（机构）
在工作或娱乐中总是马不停蹄

trans.tran_cn: 在内的，朝内的，在位的，执政的，[口语]流行的，时髦的，（车等）到站的
在家，进入，到达，流行，当选
trans.tran_en: inside or into a building, especially your home or the place where you work
used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

trans.tran_cn: 采用（某种方式），穿着，带着，（表示位置）在…里面，（表示领域，范围）在…以内，（表示品质、能力等）在…之中
trans.tran_en: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is
